We developed this recipe using a 1,000 milligram (mg) bottle of Lily CBD. It's part of the Healthyish Guide to Cooking With, Eating, and Truly Enjoying Weed in collaboration with Broccoli. Click here to read more about how to make cannabis delicious.Ingredients2 servings1mango, peeled, chopped1banana, chopped11" piece ginger, peeled, finely grated½cup unsweetened coconut water½tsp. CBD oil½tsp. ground turmericPinch of kosher saltPreparationPurée mango, banana, ginger, coconut water, CBD oil, turmeric, salt, and 1 cup ice in a blender until smooth. Divide between glasses.How would you rate CBD Mango Smoothie?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (1)Back to TopTriangleHave you ever felt sick to your stomach after taking CBD oil?
